contents.rollMessage:
${?#{Angle_Roll}}$
${g_key:=%{return ('${approach}$'.slice(0,3) + '_glitch')}%}$
${glitch:= ref(g_key)?-1:0}$
${miss:=switchCase(comp,"succ",0,"part",-1,"fail",-2,0)}$
${pool:= ref(approach) + glitch + miss + cred}$
%{game.cpnkroller.FitDRollerPopup({dice:${pool}$, purpose:"ANGLE ROLL"})}%
